item.description:
You're invited to form a four-person relay team or teams to compete in the Black Cat Road Race, a double-loop course (10 or 20 mile individual races plus a 20 mile relay course) between Salem and Marblehead, MA. There are two 4.5 and two 5.5 mile legs. Beautiful, historic course near the water, mostly flat with a few hills. More info here:

http://www.blackcatroadrace.com/

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE runs the Black Cat 20 Mile Relay, Salem, MA 3-2-13
